title: Highly recommended
text:
I had the pleasure to visit this great restaurant in April. The atmosphere is very nice and welcoming. Pricing was very reasonable also.
We will definitely be back when next in Athens

title: You Must Visit
text:
Extremely interesting historical site. The buildings and history are amazing
You can't visit Athens without going to see it.
April was the perfect time to go as it was still cool and not to many people.

title: BEST IN ATHENS
text:
This tour was the highlight of our trip!
This tour was recommended to us by our friends who were visiting Athens last year. It was amazing.
Food was amazing and a lot more than we expected. The crew was extremely friendly! The boat itself was very nice as well.
The tour ended with an atmosphere drinks, fruits. I would highly recommend to anyone visiting.
place: Unique Sailing Experience from Athens to Agistri, Moni, and Aegina
